properties.publicRemarks:
Located in the heart of Huntington Beach, this prestigious Seabridge Villas penthouse sits just one mile from the ocean. Minutes from downtown Huntington, the Pacific City Mall's upscale dining and retail, the Huntington pier, and nearby Newport Beach, Costa Mesa, and PCH. This location offers unparalleled access to Southern California's coastal lifestyle.

This is one of the largest floor plans in the Seabridge Villa Community and provides a top-floor penthouse offering resort-style coastal living, combining elegance and comfort. The residence features vaulted ceilings and an open-concept design that maximizes both space and natural light through sliding glass doors and large windows that let in the coastal breeze.

The main floor includes 2 primary bedroom suites and 2 beautifully renovated bathrooms while the second floor contains a 3rd bedroom and loft for use as an office, workout area or 4th bedroom, etc. The flowing living/dining area includes a fireplace, creating an ideal space for both relaxation and entertaining. The kitchen has been substantially expanded and completely redesigned, featuring modern quartz countertops and brand-new cabinetry. The living room and main bedroom open onto an outdoor patio with private above-ground views of the central landscaped courtyard, swimming pool and waterscape amenities.  An open spiral staircase leads to the upper level.

Convenience features include an in-unit laundry closet with stacked washer/dryer, patio storage closet and coat closet. Roof replaced in 2024, building exterior newly repainted in 2025. The underground parking garage provides 2 assigned parking spaces, secured bicycle storage and multiple guest parking spaces. The HOA fee covers water/trash service and landscape/exterior building maintenance.

Seabridge Villas residents enjoy resort-style amenities including 24-hour gate guard, elevators, two pools, two spas, a fully-equipped fitness center and a sauna, four lighted tennis courts, and a clubhouse with full kitchen available for reservation. The grounds are characterized by lush meticulously maintained landscaping in a park-like setting with interconnected walking paths that follow picturesque ponds, waterfalls and streams.

Whether you make this your primary home, vacation home, or see it as a great investment opportunity, this desirable penthouse delivers the best in coastal California living. Don't miss this opportunity. Make an appointment today!

properties.publicRemarks:
Don't miss this beautifully updated townhome in the highly desirable Huntington Townhomes community of Huntington Beach! Featuring 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms, this spacious and updated home is just minutes from the beach, parks, shopping, and restaurants... perfect for enjoying all that coastal living has to offer!
Inside, you'll find upgraded luxury vinyl plank flooring, stylish modern bathrooms with updated vanities, mirrored closet doors, recessed lighting, and a well-appointed kitchen with updated cabinetry, granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances... including a refrigerator, washer, and dryer. The home also features a private enclosed patio, ideal for relaxing or entertaining!
Additional highlights include a covered parking space with a storage closet, and access to the community pool and park area.
This is a fantastic opportunity to own in one of Huntington Beach's most sought-after townhome communities! Move-in ready and full of charm... schedule your showing today!

properties.publicRemarks:
Where Style Meets Serenity in Rancho Santa Margarita.
Step into elegance at this beautifully remodeled 3-bed, 2.5-bath home, ideally located near RSM Lake and tucked within one of the area's most desirable neighborhoods. The entire home has been thoughtfully upgraded, blending refined finishes with everyday functionality.
From the moment you enter, you're greeted by a bright, open floor plan, soaring high ceilings, and rich travertine flooring. Custom wooden plantation shutters frame the windows, while a fireplace adds warmth and charm. The home is fully pre-wired for sound and entertainment, with sleek, integrated tech connections that keep your living space clean, modern, and ready for enjoyment.
The kitchen is a showpiece — an entertainer's and chef's dream, featuring a custom two-piece cut granite countertop, matching backsplash, built-in wine rack, Signature stainless steel appliances, and a double French-door refrigerator. Custom cabinetry includes a lazy Susan, integrated lighting, and clever storage solutions that make the space as functional as it is beautiful.
The primary suite is a true retreat, offering vaulted ceilings, a ceiling fan, and access to the private balcony — complete with peaceful lake views. The luxurious en-suite bath features wood plank flooring, a modern double vanity, and a custom waterfall shower accented with River Rock and Sabina Marron porcelain from floor to ceiling — the ultimate spa-like escape.
Two additional bedrooms are spacious and bright, with glass barn doors and a shared fully remodeled bathroom showcasing stone-infused finishes, and another refreshing waterfall shower designed to energize your mornings. Additional interior highlights include:
•	Custom 6'' baseboards
•	Upgraded paint throughout
•	Updated laundry room with washer/dryer and built-in storage
•	Tiled garage floor with built-in desk, storage cabinets, and workspace. 
Step outside to your private backyard oasis, designed for entertaining and relaxing. Enjoy a hand-built California stone slate bar that seats six, complete with grill, built-in fridge, and a circular gas fire pit. A lush garden, matching bullnose stonework, and a high-end patio cover with drop-down lighting create the perfect setting for morning coffee or sunset gatherings. Community amenities include a private association pool, scenic lake trails, nearby parks, and top-rated schools —all part of the vibrant Ranch Santa Margarita Lifestyle.
